definition: throughout the entire extent, having finished or arrived at completion
details:
adverb
- throughout the entire extent
= example: throughout the entire extent
= synonyms: through and through
- over the whole distance
= example: over the whole distance
- in diameter
= example: in diameter
- from beginning to end
= example: from beginning to end
= synonyms: around
- to completion
= example: to completion
adjective
- having finished or arrived at completion
= synonyms: done, through with
- (of a route or journey etc.) continuing without requiring stops or changes
